lesson_html:
• Hello! - A common way to greet someone.
  • How are you? - A friendly question to ask about someone's well-being.
  • Good morning! - Used in the morning to greet someone.
  • Goodbye! - A way to say farewell when leaving.
  • Nice to meet you! - A polite phrase when meeting someone for the first time.
